word: Calling him into his presence, he says, "O Belteshazzar, master of the magicians, because I know that the spirit of the holy gods is in thee, and no secret troubleth thee, tell me the visions of my dream that I have seen, and the interpretation thereof" [verse 9]. Then Nebuchadnezzar related his dream, saying, [verses 10-17, R.V., quoted].
